25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas said:"If any do fail to judge (by the light of) what Allah has revealed, they are (no better than) unbelievers" up to "wrongdoers." These three verses were revealed about the Jews, particularly about Quraizah and al-Nadir

chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Judge Who Is Mistaken
